resources.string: \"the gesture appeared both affected and stagy\"

"examples": ["you might become differently affected toward him"] } ], "wordForms": [{"word": "affected", "form": "adjective"} ], "word": "affected", "pos": "Adjective", "phoneticText": "əˈfektəd"}, "examples": ["the atrocities he witnessed have affected him most deeply"] } ], "meaning": "have an effect on; make a difference to.", "synonyms": [{"nym": "have an effect on"}, {"nymResult": {"query": "influence", "dataset": {"dataset": "dictionary"} }, "nym": "influence"}, {"nym": "act on"}, {"nym": "work on"}, {"nym": "have an impact on"}, {"nymResult": {"query": "impact", "dataset": {"dataset": "dictionary"} }, "nym": "impact"} ], "examples": ["the dampness began to affect my health", "your attitude will affect how successful you are"] } ], "wordForms": [{"word": "affected", "form": "past resources.string: Donation is optional. Everything works the same with or without donation. But if you want to say thank you to the app developer you can donate some cash.\n\nAs a thank you we will remove the ads.
You will be sent to Google Play to view the final amount in your local currency and complete the process.
if you like this app, please consider\nmaking some donation.\nThank you
